u(e+"err",[r,a,d],c),d}finally{u(e+"end",[r,a,s],c)}}return r(t)?t:(e||(e=""),nrWrapper[a]=t,d(t,nrWrapper),nrWrapper)}function f(t,e,o,i){o||(o="");var a,c,s,f="-"===o.charAt(0);for(s=0;s<e.length;s++)c=e[s],a=t[c],r(a)||(t[c]=n(a,f?c+o:o,i,c))}function u(n,r,o){if(!s||e){var i=s;s=!0;try{t.emit(n,r,o,e)}catch(a){p([a,n,r,o])}s=i}}function d(t,e){if(Object.defineProperty&&Object.keys)try{var n=Object.keys(t);return n.forEach(function(n){Object.defineProperty(e,n,{get:function(){return t[n]},set:function(e){return t[n]=e,e}})}),e}catch(r){p([r])}for(var o in t)c.call(t,o)&&(e[o]=t[o]);return e}function p(e){try{t.emit("internal-error",e)}catch(n){}}return t||(t=o),n.inPlace=f,n.flag=a,n}},{}],ee:[function(t,e,n){function r(){}function o(t){function e(t){return t&&t instanceof r?t:t?s(t,c,i):i()}function n(n,r,o,i){if(!p.aborted||i){t&&t(n,r,o);for(var a=e(o),c=l(n),s=c.length,f=0;f<s;f++)c[f].apply(a,r);var d=u[y[n]];return d&&d.push([b,n,r,a]),a}}function h(t,e){w[t]=l(t).concat(e)}function l(t){return w[t]||[]}function m(t){return d[t]=d[t]||o(n)}function v(t,e){f(t,function(t,n){e=e||"feature",y[n]=e,e in u||(u[e]=[])})}var w={},y={},b={on:h,emit:n,get:m,listeners:l,context:e,buffer:v,abort:a,aborted:!1};return b}function i(){return new r}function a(){(u.api||u.feature)&&(p.aborted=!0,u=p.backlog={})}var c="nr@context",s=t("gos"),f=t(20),u={},d={},p=e.exports=o();p.backlog=u},{}],gos:[function(t,e,n){function r(t,e,n){if(o.call(t,e))return t[e];var r=n();if(Object.defineProperty&&Object.keys)try{return Object.defineProperty(t,e,{value:r,writable:!0,enumerable:!1}),r}catch(i){}return t[e]=r,r}var o=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty;e.exports=r},{}],handle:[function(t,e,n){function r(t,e,n,r){o.buffer([t],r),o.emit(t,e,n)}var o=t("ee").get("handle");e.exports=r,r.ee=o},{}],id:[function(t,e,n){function r(t){var e=typeof t;return!t||"object"!==e&&"function"!==e?-1:t===window?0:a(t,i,function(){return o++})}var o=1,i="nr@id",a=t("gos");e.exports=r},{}],loader:[function(t,e,n){function r(){if(!x++){var t=g.info=NREUM.info,e=p.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];if(setTimeout(u.abort,3e4),!(t&&t.licenseKey&&t.applicationID&&e))return u.abort();f(y,function(e,n){t[e]||(t[e]=n)}),s("mark",["onload",a()+g.offset],null,"api");var n=p.createElement("script");n.src="https://"+t.agent,e.parentNode.insertBefore(n,e)}}function o(){"complete"===p.readyState&&i()}function i(){s("mark",["domContent",a()+g.offset],null,"api")}function a(){return E.exists&&performance.now?Math.round(performance.now()):(c=Math.max((new Date).getTime(),c))-g.offset}var c=(new Date).getTime(),s=t("handle"),f=t(20),u=t("ee"),d=window,p=d.document,h="addEventListener",l="attachEvent",m=d.XMLHttpRequest,v=m&&m.prototype;NREUM.o={ST:setTimeout,SI:d.setImmediate,CT:clearTimeout,XHR:m,REQ:d.Request,EV:d.Event,PR:d.Promise,MO:d.MutationObserver};var    </script>
   <script>
    dataLayer=[];(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':

     })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-NVGRHT');

             </div>
            </a>
            <div class="info-block__content" data-reactid="153">
             <div class="info-block__content__details" data-reactid="154">
              Haben Sie einen eigenen Lieferdienst und wollen über pizza.de Bestellungen erhalten?
             </div>
             <div class="info-block__content__link" data-reactid="155">
              <a class="_3NRc" data-qa="link" data-reactid="156" href="/info/partner/" target="" title="">
               Mehr...
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </section>
        </section>
       </div>
      </section>
      <section class="page-section page-section--padding" data-qa="page-section" data-reactid="157">

      <section class="page-section page-section--padding" data-qa="page-section" data-reactid="224">
       <div class="page-section__content" data-reactid="225">
        <section class="_1HmV _2x4W" data-reactid="226">
         <section class="_1CE7 _3XGK" data-reactid="227">
          <div class="page-main__info-block page-main__info-block--order" data-reactid="228">
           <div class="info-block" data-qa="info-block" data-reactid="229">
            <div class="info-block__heading" data-reactid="230">
             <h4 class="heading heading--level-4 u-tt-caps" data-qa="heading" data-reactid="231">
              Online Essen bestellen
             </h4>
            </div>
            <!-- react-text: 232 -->
            <!-- /react-text -->
            <a class="info-block__link _3NRc" data-qa="link" data-reactid="233" href="/info/deals/" target="" title="">
             <div class="info-block__link__icon" data-reactid="234">
              <span class="icon--arrow-right _2Pnx _7R9J" data-qa="icon" data-reactid="235">
               <svg data-reactid="236">
                <use data-reactid="237" xlink:href="#icon--arrow-right" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
                </use>
               </svg>
              </span>
             </div>
            </a>
            <div class="info-block__content" data-reactid="238">
             <div class="info-block__content__details" data-reactid="239">
              Auf pizza.de bei den besten Lieferdiensten und Pizzaservices in ganz Deutschland online Essen bestellen. Die Bestellung ist einfach, zuverlässig und kommt binnen Sekunden beim gewählten Lieferservice an. Ob Pizza, Asiatisch, Sushi, Burger, Indisch oder andere Fast-Food-Spezialitäten: Einfach passendes Gericht auswählen und direkt online bestellen. Bezahlt werden Thai, Pasta und Gyros easy online mit PayPal, VISA oder Sofortüberweisung oder wie gewohnt bei Lieferung.
             </div>
             <div class="info-block__content__link" data-reactid="240">
              <a class="_3NRc" data-qa="link" data-reactid="241" href="/info/deals/" target="" title="">
               Mehr...
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </section>
         <section class="_1CE7 _3XGK" data-reactid="242">
          <div class="page-main__info-block page-main__info-block--delivery" data-reactid="243">
           <div class="info-block" data-qa="info-block" data-reactid="244">
            <div class="info-block__heading" data-reactid="245">
             <h4 class="heading heading--level-4 u-tt-caps" data-qa="heading" data-reactid="246">
              Lieferdienste für jeden Geschmack
             </h4>
            </div>
            <!-- react-text: 247 -->
            <!-- /react-text -->
            <!-- react-text: 248 -->
            <!-- /react-text -->
            <div class="info-block__content" data-reactid="249">
             <div class="info-block__content__details" data-reactid="250">
              Auf pizza.de geht es um viel mehr als nur um Pizza. Egal, ob Chinesisch, Burger, Döner, Salate oder Griechisch: Alle Köstlichkeiten der modernen Küche lassen sich ganz einfach vom Bestellservice nach Hause liefern. Finde durch die Empfehlungen anderer Besteller die besten Gerichte deiner Stadt. Oder verfolge mit dem pizza.de LiveTracking die Lieferung deines Essens vom Restaurant bis an die Haustür!
             </div>
             <!-- react-text: 251 -->
             <!-- /react-text -->
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </section>
        </section>
       </div>
      </section>
      <section class="page-section page-section--padding" data-qa="page-section" data-reactid="252">
       <div class="page-section__content" data-reactid="253">
        <section class="_1HmV _2x4W" data-reactid="254">
         <section class="_1CE7 _2VAm" data-reactid="255">
          <div class="page-main__info-block page-main__info-block--safety" data-reactid="256">
           <div class="info-block" data-qa="info-block" data-reactid="257">
            <div class="info-block__heading" data-reactid="258">
             <h4 class="heading heading--level-4 u-tt-caps" data-qa="heading" data-reactid="259">
              Sicherheit
             </h4>
            </div>
            <!-- react-text: 260 -->
            <!-- /react-text -->
            <!-- react-text: 261 -->
            <!-- /react-text -->
            <div class="info-block__content" data-reactid="262">
             <div class="info-block__content__details" data-reactid="263">
              <!-- react-text: 264 -->
              Der Schutz der Privatsphäre hat bei uns höchste Priorität. Wir handeln nicht mit Daten und schützen sie durch technische Maßnahmen vor Missbrauch.
              <!-- /react-text -->
              <nav data-reactid="265">
               <span data-reactid="266">
                <a href="/info/zuverlaessigkeit/" rel="nofollow" title="Zuverlässige Bestellvermittlung">
                 Zuverlässigkeit
                </a>
                <a href="/info/ssl/" rel="nofollow" title="SSL-Verschlüsselung">
                 Verschlüsselung
                </a>
               </span>
              </nav>
             </div>
             <!-- react-text: 267 -->
             <!-- /react-text -->
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </section>

     <section class="page__footer" data-reactid="325">
      <footer class="_2Ksz _1qd1" data-qa="footer" data-reactid="326">
       <div class="_12qO _3tIZ" data-reactid="327">
        <div class="footer__main" data-reactid="328">
         <ul class="footer__navi" data-qa="footer-navi" data-reactid="329">

          <li class="footer__navi__item" data-reactid="336">

            </a>
           </div>
          </li>
          <li class="footer__navi__item" data-reactid="339">
